HPI 960 Lancia 037 Red

The Lancia Rally, more commonly known as the Lancia 037, was Lancia's first WRC car built to compete in Group B. The 037 took the Manufacturers' title in it's first year of competition (1983) but had only 1 victory the following year losing out to the Audi Quattro & Peugeot 205. That single win in 1984 was the last WRC win for a rear-wheel drive car.

If you have 5 minutes I highly suggest checking out A Lancia 037 Group B, an empty road, and little else.
